item.title: 独家：消息人士称华为准备大规模出货新型人工智能芯片，中国正寻求英伟达的替代方案
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，华为技术公司（HWT.UL）计划最早于下月开始向中国客户批量发货其先进的 910C 人工智能芯片。【原文：Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) plans to begin mass shipments of its advanced 910C artificial intelligence chip to Chinese customers as early as next month, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 谷歌在美国结束搜索垄断面临审判
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周一将面临一场历史性的审判，美国华盛顿的反垄断执法人员将寻求迫使这家科技巨头出售其 Chrome 浏览器，作为恢复在线搜索引擎市场竞争的努力的一部分。【原文：Alphabet's Google faces a historic trial on Monday as U.S. antitrust enforcers in Washington seek to force the tech giant to sell off its Chrome browser as part of a bid to restore competition to the market for online search engines.】

item.title: 共和党议员在制定税收法案时面临清洁能源难题
item.description: 致力于延长美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的减税法案的共和党议员们在国内正面临着清洁能源的难题，因为他们选区内的主要清洁能源投资与特朗普对该行业的怀疑态度相悖。【原文：Republican lawmakers working to extend U.S. President Donald Trump's tax cuts legislation are facing a clean-energy conundrum back home, as major clean energy investments in their districts are at odds with Trump's skepticism of the industry.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 在董事会争斗中就 Citgo 公司利益冲突问题回击 Elliott
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，菲利普斯 66 公司认为埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）应该放弃拆分这家能源公司的努力，因为这位激进投资者与收购菲利普斯 66 公司竞争对手的另一项努力存在冲突。【原文：Phillips 66 is arguing that Elliott Investment Management should back down from its push to break up the energy company because the activist investor is conflicted from a separate effort to acquire one of Phillips 66's rivals, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 洞察力：特朗普着眼于煤炭复兴，他的裁员措施却削弱了对矿工的黑肺保护
item.description: 乔希-科克伦自 22 岁起就在西弗吉尼亚州的煤矿深处工作，拿着六位数的薪水，得以与妻子斯蒂芬妮一起买房，业余时间打猎和钓鱼。【原文：Josh Cochran worked deep in the coal mines of West Virginia since he was 22 years old, pulling a six-figure salary that allowed him to buy a home with his wife Stephanie and hunt and fish in his spare time.】

item.title: 波音公司缓解了最新的 737 MAX 头疼问题--螺母和螺栓短缺
item.description: 两位业内消息人士告诉路透社记者，波音公司已经获得了新的专用螺母和螺栓库存，这些螺母和螺栓用于组装其最畅销的商用喷气机，从而暂时避免了美国飞机生产因一家主要供应商的工厂发生火灾而放缓。【原文：Boeing has secured new stocks of specialized nuts and bolts that hold together its top-selling commercial jet, two industry sources told Reuters, avoiding for now any slowdown in U.S. plane production due to a fire at a key supplier's factory.】

item.title: 在马斯克的反击和竞争损害需求之后，特斯拉的经济型电动车和机器人轴成为关注焦点
item.description: 特斯拉的投资者将迫不及待地向首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）询问两个迫切的问题：平价汽车何时推出，机器人出租车计划是否如期进行？【原文：Tesla investors will be eager to ask CEO Elon Musk two pressing questions when the electric vehicle maker reports results on Tuesday: when will the affordable vehicle launch, and is the robotaxi plan on schedule?】

item.title: 中国央行敦促国有企业在海外扩张中优先使用人民币
item.description: 中国央行周一表示，鼓励国有企业在海外扩张中优先使用人民币支付和结算，这被视为在全球贸易紧张局势加剧的背景下加快人民币国际化的官方尝试。【原文：China's central bank said on Monday it was encouraging state-owned enterprises to prioritise yuan usage in payment and settlement in their overseas expansion, in what is seen as an official attempt to accelerate yuan internationalisation amid intensifying global trade tensions.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击鲍威尔，美股期货下跌
item.description: 美国股指期货周一下跌，原因是唐纳德-特朗普总统对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的抨击引发了对央行独立性的担忧，令已经在努力应对不断升级的贸易战的投资者感到不安。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Monday, as President Donald Trump's attacks on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell sparked worries about the central bank's independence, rattling investors already grappling with an escalating trade war.】

item.title: Netflix股价上涨，美好前景平息投资者对关税的担忧
item.description: Netflix 的股价在周一盘前交易中上涨了约 3%，原因是这家流媒体巨头乐观的年度营收展望让投资者放心，在充满关税的经济环境下，它可以抵御任何经济衰退。【原文：Netflix shares rose about 3% in premarket trading on Monday as the streaming giant's upbeat annual revenue outlook reassured investors that it could withstand any economic downturn amid a tariff laden economic climate.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，亚洲债券吸引七个月来最大规模外资流入
item.description: 3 月份，亚洲债券吸引了七个月来最大规模的月度外资流入，其原因是人们对地区央行降息抱有希望，以及亚洲债券作为避风港的吸引力，因为对美国关税和经济衰退的担忧打击了全球资产。【原文：Asian bonds attracted the largest monthly foreign inflows in seven months in March, driven by hopes of rate cuts from regional central banks and their appeal as a haven as global assets were hit on worries over U.S. tariffs and a recession.】

item.title: 印尼央行将于 4 月 23 日维持利率不变，原因是对外汇的担忧超过了经济增长的风险：路透调查
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，尽管人们越来越担心美国主导的贸易政策会导致经济增长放缓，但印尼央行周三仍将维持利率稳定，以支撑承压的印尼盾。【原文：Bank Indonesia will hold interest rates steady on Wednesday to support the under-pressure rupiah, despite growing concerns of slowing economic growth driven by U.S.-led trade policies, a Reuters poll of economists found.】

item.title: 关税协议谈判将成为本周国际货币基金组织和世界银行会议的主要议题
item.description: 本周，数百位全球金融界领袖将齐聚华盛顿，每个人都肩负着独特的使命：我可以与谁交谈以达成贸易协议？【原文：Hundreds of global finance leaders will descend on Washington this week, each with a singular mission: Who can I talk with to cut a trade deal?】

item.title: 中国电池制造商 CATL 推出第二代快速充电电池
item.description: CATL 周一推出了第二代 "慎行 "快速充电电池，并表示今年将为超过 67 款新型电动汽车提供动力。【原文：CATL on Monday launched the second generation of its "Shenxing" fast-charging battery, which it said would power more than 67 new electric vehicle models this year.】

item.title: 在中国车展上，电动汽车制造商将应对自主技术打压，推出特斯拉 "杀手"。
item.description: 70 多个中国和国际汽车品牌将在本周举行的上海车展上展示 100 多款新车型或改款车型，这将加剧全球首屈一指的电动汽车和混合动力汽车市场本已残酷的竞争。【原文：More than 70 Chinese and international automotive brands will showcase more than 100 new or refreshed models at the Shanghai auto show this week, intensifying already cutthroat competition in the world's premier market for electric vehicles and hybrids.】

item.title: 任天堂推出 Switch 2 面临贸易战考验
item.description: 任天堂的 Switch 在大范围限购期间成为了人们急需的逃避工具。现在，这家日本视频游戏公司在推出其后续设备时，面临着残酷的贸易战这一严酷现实。【原文：Nintendo's Switch became a source of much-needed escapism during pandemic restrictions. Now, the Japanese video game company faces the harsh reality of a brutal trade war as it launches its successor device.】

item.title: 监管机构：韩国股市有可能加入发达市场指数
item.description: 韩国金融监管机构副主管周一表示，韩国股市很有可能在不久的将来被纳入一个重要的发达市场指数。【原文：The vice chief of South Korea's financial regulatory agency said on Monday there is a high likelihood of the country's stock market being included in a key developed market index in the near future.】

item.title: 韩国 LG Energy Solution 退出印尼电动汽车电池投资项目
item.description: 韩国 LG Energy Solution 公司周一表示，该公司已正式退出在印尼实施的 142 万亿卢比（84.5 亿美元）电动汽车电池制造项目。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution has formally withdrawn from a 142 trillion rupiah ($8.45 billion) project in electric vehicle battery making in Indonesia, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税忧虑刺激日本央行债券海外需求创新高
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）咄咄逼人的关税政策引发了对美国经济衰退的担忧，资金纷纷撤出美债，寻找其他避风港，上个月最长期限的日本政府债券吸引了创纪录的外国需求。【原文：The longest-dated Japanese government bonds attracted record foreign demand last month as money shifted out of U.S. debt in search of other safe havens as President Donald Trump's aggressive tariffs sparked concerns of a U.S. recession.】

item.title: 马来西亚表示尊重多边主义，将继续与中国、欧盟和美国接触
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部长周一表示，马来西亚尊重多边主义原则，并将继续与中国、欧盟和美国等贸易伙伴保持接触。【原文：Malaysia respects the principle of multilateralism and will continue to engage with trading partners such as China, the European Union and the United States, its trade minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 印度财政部长表示希望今年与美国缔结贸易协定
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）周一表示，印度希望在今年秋季与美国 "积极缔结 "贸易协定的第一部分。【原文：India hopes to "positively conclude" the first part of a trade pact with the United States by this autumn, finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman said on Monday as she started on a trip packed with engagements between the two nations.】

item.title: 石破首相表示，日本将对美国贸易协议的不一致性表示担忧
item.description: 日本首相石破茂周一表示，东京没有计划终止2019年与美国达成的贸易协议，但将继续对该协议与唐纳德-特朗普总统最新汽车关税之间的不一致表示 "严重关切"。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said on Monday Tokyo has no plan to terminate a trade deal struck with the U.S. in 2019, but will keep voicing "grave concern" over inconsistency between the deal and President Donald Trump's latest automobile tariffs.】

item.title: 土耳其总统西姆塞克美国之行将会见评级机构和投资者
item.description: 土耳其财政部长穆罕默德-西姆塞克（Mehmet Simsek）表示，他将在本周访问美国期间会见评级机构、投资者和计划将供应转向土耳其的公司。【原文：Turkish Finance Minister Mehmet Simsek said he will meet with rating agencies, investors and companies planning to shift supply to Turkey during a visit to the United States this week.】

item.title: 价值数十亿美元的网络诈骗产业这一 "毒瘤 "正在全球蔓延 - 联合国
item.description: 联合国在周一的一份报告中指出，由于东南亚的突袭行动未能遏制其活动，数十亿美元网络诈骗产业背后的亚洲犯罪集团正在向全球扩张，包括南美和非洲。【原文：Asian crime syndicates behind the multibillion-dollar cyberscam industry are expanding globally including to South America and Africa, as raids in Southeast Asia fail to contain their activities, the United Nations said in a report on Monday.】

item.title: 日本央行总裁上田将访问华盛顿参加 G20 和国际货币基金组织会议
item.description: 日本央行周一表示，日本央行行长上田一夫将于周二至周日访问华盛顿，出席二十国集团（G20）金融领导人会议和国际货币基金组织春季年会。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda will visit Washington from Tuesday through Sunday to attend the G20 finance leaders' gathering and the annual spring International Monetary Fund meetings, the central bank said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国的 JD.com 呼吁对食品快递公司施加反竞争压力
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头京东外卖周一在社交媒体上发文，强调送餐快递公司面临的反竞争压力，称其他平台胁迫快递公司避免与京东外卖合作。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giant JD.com highlighted anti-competitive pressures on food delivery couriers in a social media post on Monday, alleging that other platforms were coercing couriers to avoid working with JD Takeaway.】

item.title: 贸易战冲击北京的美式餐厅，美国牛肉从菜单上消失
item.description: 在北京的一家美式餐厅 Home Plate BBQ，员工们正在重新印制菜单。中美贸易战意味着美国牛肉--曾经的明星食材--很快将退出餐桌。【原文：At Home Plate BBQ, an American-style restaurant in Beijing, staff are reprinting menus. The U.S.-China trade war means American beef - once the star ingredient - will soon be off the table.】

item.title: 美国跨国公司扩大货币对冲以应对特朗普的关税波动
item.description: 美国跨国公司正在将其货币对冲期限延长，以保护其现金流免受特朗普政府关税政策引发的潜在汇率波动的影响。【原文：U.S. multinational companies are extending their currency hedges to longer periods to shield their cash flows from potential exchange rate volatility triggered by the Trump administration's tariff policies.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，欧盟探讨调整美国天然气甲烷规定，以帮助贸易谈判
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，欧盟正在研究如何让美国的天然气出口更容易遵守其甲烷排放规定，因为该集团正试图避免与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普爆发贸易战。【原文：The European Union is looking at ways to make it easier for U.S. gas exports to comply with its methane emissions rules, as the bloc attempts to avert a trade war with U.S. President Donald Trump, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 如果中国拒绝接受波音飞机，马航将考虑购买新飞机
item.description: 马来西亚航空的母公司马来西亚航空集团（Malaysia Aviation Group）总经理告诉马来西亚国家新闻媒体《伯纳玛报》（Bernama），该公司正在与波音公司商谈，如果中国航空公司停止接收交付的飞机，该公司将购买新的喷气式飞机。【原文：Malaysia Airlines' parent company, Malaysia Aviation Group, is talking to Boeing about acquiring new jets that become available if Chinese airlines stop taking deliveries, its managing director told Malaysian state news outlet Bernama.】
